tool.name: qiime2 diversity beta-rarefaction

param.name: table
param.label: table: FeatureTable[Frequency]
param.help: [required] Feature table upon which to perform beta diversity rarefaction analyses.

param.name: metric
param.help: [required] The beta diversity metric to be computed.

param.name: clustering_method
param.label: clustering_method: Str % Choices('upgma', 'nj')
param.help: [required] Samples can be clustered with neighbor joining or UPGMA. An arbitrary rarefaction trial will be used for the tree, and the remaining trials are used to calculate the support of the internal nodes of that tree.

repeat.name: metadata
repeat.help: [required] The sample metadata used for the Emperor jackknifed PCoA plot.
repeat.title: metadata: Metadata

param.name: sampling_depth
param.label: sampling_depth: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [required] The total frequency that each sample should be rarefied to prior to computing the diversity metric.

param.name: phylogeny
param.label: phylogeny: Phylogeny[Rooted]
param.help: [optional] Phylogenetic tree containing tip identifiers that correspond to the feature identifiers in the table. This tree can contain tip ids that are not present in the table, but all feature ids in the table must be present in this tree. [required for phylogenetic metrics]

param.name: iterations
param.label: iterations: Int % Range(2, None)
param.help: [default: 10] Number of times to rarefy the feature table at a given sampling depth.

param.name: correlation_method
param.label: correlation_method: Str % Choices('pearson', 'spearman')
param.help: [default: 'spearman'] The Mantel correlation test to be applied when computing correlation between beta diversity distance matrices.

param.name: color_scheme
param.label: color_scheme: Str % Choices('BrBG', 'BrBG_r', 'PRGn', 'PRGn_r', 'PiYG', 'PiYG_r', 'PuOr', 'PuOr_r', 'RdBu', 'RdBu_r', 'RdGy', 'RdGy_r', 'RdYlBu', 'RdYlBu_r', 'RdYlGn', 'RdYlGn_r')
param.help: [default: 'BrBG'] The matplotlib color scheme to generate the heatmap with.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: diversity beta-rarefaction =================================== Beta diversity rarefaction
Outputs: -------- :visualization.qzv: <no description>
|
Description: ------------ Repeatedly rarefy a feature table to compare beta diversity results within a given rarefaction depth.
For a given beta diversity metric, this visualizer will provide: an Emperor jackknifed PCoA plot, samples clustered by UPGMA or neighbor joining with support calculation, and a heatmap showing the correlation between rarefaction trials of that beta diversity metric.
|
